languages.text: "А как же прозорливые мародеры, копающиеся в нутре этого мертвого колосса пустоты? Поболтайте с ними — мудрость кроется в неожиданных местах, шерин".
"What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."
languages.original_text: "А как же прозорливые мародеры, копающиеся в нутре этого мертвого колосса пустоты? Поболтайте с ними — мудрость кроется в неожиданных местах, шерин".

traits.locale_text: "What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."
"What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."
"What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."
"What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."

languages.text: “那群狡猾的劫掠者在这座衰败的虚空巨像中扎了根，该拿他们怎么办？去和他们谈谈吧，毕竟智慧总是会出现在意想不到的地方，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: "What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."

traits.locale_text: “那群狡猾的劫掠者在这座衰败的虚空巨像中扎了根，该拿他们怎么办？去和他们谈谈吧，毕竟智慧总是会出现在意想不到的地方，亲爱的。”

languages.text: «¿Qué hay de los sagaces saqueadores que acechan en las entrañas de este coloso muerto del vacío? Habla con ellos: el saber puede hallarse en lugares inesperados, shereen».
languages.original_text: "What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué hay de los sagaces saqueadores que acechan en las entrañas de este coloso muerto del vacío? Habla con ellos: el saber puede hallarse en lugares inesperados, shereen».

languages.text: 「このヴォイドの死した巨人のはらわたに根を張っている、利口な虐殺者たちについてはどうかしら？彼らと話してみましょ…知恵は思いもかけぬところで見つかるもの、でしょう」
languages.original_text: "What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."

traits.locale_text: 「このヴォイドの死した巨人のはらわたに根を張っている、利口な虐殺者たちについてはどうかしら？彼らと話してみましょ…知恵は思いもかけぬところで見つかるもの、でしょう」

languages.text: "Was ist mit den klugen Marodeuren, die in diesem toten Koloss der Leere herumstreifen? Sprecht mit ihnen ... Weisheit ist an unerwarteten Orten zu finden, Shereen."
languages.original_text: "What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Was ist mit den klugen Marodeuren, die in diesem toten Koloss der Leere herumstreifen? Sprecht mit ihnen ... Weisheit ist an unerwarteten Orten zu finden, Shereen."

languages.text: « Qu'en est-il des maraudeurs qui farfouillent les entrailles de ce colosse du vide ? Vous devriez leur parler, shereen. La sagesse n'est pas toujours là où on l'attend. »
languages.original_text: "What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'en est-il des maraudeurs qui farfouillent les entrailles de ce colosse du vide ? Vous devriez leur parler, shereen. La sagesse n'est pas toujours là où on l'attend. »

languages.text: "Peki ya uçsuzun bu ölü devinin içine kök salmış zeki yağmacılar ne olacak? Onlarla konuş, irfan hiç beklemediğin yerlerde karşına çıkabilir şirinim."
languages.original_text: "What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Peki ya uçsuzun bu ölü devinin içine kök salmış zeki yağmacılar ne olacak? Onlarla konuş, irfan hiç beklemediğin yerlerde karşına çıkabilir şirinim."

languages.original_text: "What about the sagacious marauders rooting around in the guts of this dead colossus of the void? Talk to them — wisdom can be found in unexpected places, shereen."
